input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: PRZEDSIĘBIORSTWO KOMUNIKACJI SAMOCHODOWEJ W SŁUPSK SPÓŁKA AKCYJNA. Summary: Delivery (Purchase) of Diesel Oil in the Electronic Fleet Card System for Vehicles of Przedsiębiorstwo Komunikacji Samochodowej W Słupsk Spółka Akcyjna. Description: 1. The subject of the order is the supply of diesel oil, consisting in enabling the refueling of vehicles belonging to the Ordering Party at the Contractor's gas station. 2. The order will be fulfilled by refueling vehicles belonging to the Ordering Party (currently the ordering party has 76 buses and 4 cars) at the Contractor's gas stations. The frequency of refueling will depend on the actual needs of the Ordering Party. 3. Expected demand for diesel oil during the period covered by the order (12 months) is 1,300,000 liters. 4. The Ordering Party reserves that the amount of diesel oil is an estimated value, therefore marking it at this level does not cause any negative consequences for the Ordering Party, in particular it does not change the discount in if it is necessary to order more or less fuel during the contract period. The Ordering Party will purchase appropriate quantities of diesel oil based on actual needs. 5.The diesel fuel offered must be adapted to weather conditions prevailing outside and meet the requirements specified in the Regulation of the Minister of Economy of October 9, 2015 on quality requirements for fuels and comply with the PN-EN 590 standard (if the regulations regulations provide for higher requirements than the standard, the provisions of the regulation decide). The offered diesel oil may be characterized by the manufacturer's factory standards, but with the same or better quality parameters.... Published Date: 2025-12-24. Closing Date: 2026-01-19. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: SOCIAL INSURANCE INSTITUTION. Summary: Supply of Electricity for the Operation of Buildings and Commercial Premises of the Social Insurance Institution. Description: 1. The subject of the order is the supply of electricity for the operation of buildings and commercial premises of the Social Insurance Institution. The total estimated volume of electricity supplied is 116,823,200 kWh (116,823,200 MWh). Order is divided into three separate parts of the order. The division into parts is made according to the territorial affiliation of a given ZUS Branch to the Distribution System Operator (DSO). 1.1.part A: electricity supply in the planned consumption amount of 60,100 800 kWh (60,100.800 MWh) to organizational units (Branches) of ZUS: Białystok, Biłgoraj, Jasło, Kielce, Lublin, Łódź I, Łódź II, Olsztyn, Płock, Radom, Rzeszów, Siedlce, Tomaszów Mazowiecki, Warsaw I, Warsaw II, Warsaw III, COS in Osuchów, Headquarters ZUS. 1.2.part B: supply of electricity in the planned consumption amount of 27,131,500 kWh (27,131,500 MWh) to the organizational units (Branches) of ZUS: Bydgoszcz, Elbląg, Gdańsk, Gorzów Wielkopolski, Koszalin, Ostrów Wielkopolski, Piła, Poznań I, Poznań II, Słupsk, Szczecin, Toruń, Zielona Góra. 1.3.part C: supply of electricity in the planned consumption amount of 29,590,900 kWh (29,590.900 MWh) to the organizational units (Branches) of ZUS: Bielsko-Biała, Chorzów, Chrzanów, Częstochowa, Kraków, Legnica, Nowy Sącz, Opole, Rybnik, Sosnowiec, Tarnów, Wałbrzych, Wrocław, Zabrze. 2. Description: The subject of this order is the construction of a photovoltaic installation at the Zawada Water Treatment Station in Zielona Góra, divided into two stages, according to the design documentation: 1)Construction of a photovoltaic installation with a capacity of up to 160 kW at the Station Zawada Water Treatment Plant in Zielona Góra. The photovoltaic installation will be connected to the existing RG in the existing transformer station building. Designed photovoltaic installation due to its location and connection power, will consist of the following elements: photovoltaic cells on supporting structures in the amount of 286 pcs., 3 inverters with a total rated power of 150 kW. DC electrical installation three-phase electrical installation alternating 2)Construction of a photovoltaic installation with a capacity of up to 560 kW along with an energy storage facility with a capacity of 1,290 kWh at the Zawada Water Treatment Plant in Zielona Góra. The photovoltaic installation will be connected to the existing RG in the existing building transformer station, through the designed RN-W connector. The energy storage is designed as a prefabricated container structure consisting of the following elements: •concrete casing of the warehouse with a transformer chamber, •concrete foundation prefabricated, •LV and DC switchboards, •bidirectional AC/DC converter, •SPS-kontrol control system, •fire extinguishing system. •energy reservoir, •transformer, •concrete roof. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: JABŁONNA COMMUNE. Summary: Comprehensive Supply and Sale of Gas Fuel for the Needs of the Jabłonna Municipality. Description: "Comprehensive delivery and sale of gas fuel for the needs of the Jabłonna Commune from March 1, 2026 to December 31, 2027" The subject of the order is the supply of high-methane natural gas for a period of 22 months, from March 1, 2026 to December 31, 2027, including the sale and distribution of gas for facilities managed by the Jabłonna Commune. The order includes 18 consumption points for which the Ordering Party expects a total consumption over a period of 22 months, i.e. from March 1, 2026 to December 31, 2027 (22 months from the date of conclusion of the contract) in amounting to 4087.51 MWh. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: ZŁOTÓW COMMUNE. Summary: Delivery of Wood Pellets in 2026.. Description: The subject of the order is the successive delivery of wood pellets to the Commune Office, village halls and the Primary School in Święta and the Primary School in Kleszczyna, with a total volume of deliveries of approximately 105.0 tons. The Ordering Party stipulates that the indicated amount of fuel is an estimate, used to calculate the offer price, compare the offer and select the best offer. The ordering party reserves the right to reduce the total order quantity by 20%. The contractor with whom the ordering party signs a contract is not entitled to a claim for implementation deliveries in the amounts specified in the offer form. The Contractor will be obliged to provide pellets of the appropriate (required) quality, made of wood from coniferous or deciduous trees, or a mixture of coniferous and deciduous trees, without any admixture of other substances, such as: adhesives, binders or hardeners, in the form of cylinders with a diameter of 6 to 8 mm (for the boiler room of the Zotów Commune Office, pellets of 6 mm diameter) and a length of up to 40 mm, with parameters not worse than: - calorific value 17.00 [MJ/kg], - average density 600 [kg/m3], - humidity 10%, - ash content 0.7%. The offered pellet must have the ENPlus A1 certificate.. Published Date: 2025-12-19. Closing Date: 2025-12-29. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: NOVA SP. Z O.O.. Summary: Sales and Delivery of Diesel Oil with Properties According to Pn-En 590:2022-08 for the Nova Company with its Registered Office in nowy Sacz at Ul. Tarnowska 120. Description: The subject of the order is: Sales and delivery of diesel oil with properties according to PN-EN 590:2022-08 for the NOVA company based in Nowy Sącz at ul. Tarnowska 120. The order covers the period: from the date of signing the contract but not earlier than March 1 2026 to February 28, 2027 Technical description of the subject of the order. 1. The subject of the order is the sale of diesel oil with an established quality standard according to PN-PN-EN 590:2022-08 and its delivery by the Contractor's transport in the quantities required by of the Ordering Party (one-time delivery of a maximum of 5,000 liters), taking into account parameters in summer and winter, depending on weather conditions. 2.During the entire order period, diesel oil will be delivered directly to the Development Plant Waste in Nowy Sącz at ul. Tarnowska 120. The annual quantity of diesel oil is estimated at no more than 280,000 liters. The final amount of diesel oil will result from the actual needs of the Ordering Party during the term of the contract. Reducing the amount of diesel oil will not constitute the basis for any financial claims by the Contractor, provided that the Ordering Party is obliged to collect at least 100,000 liters from the Contractor. Failure to collect this minimum quantity The Ordering Party shall be liable for damages on general principles provided for by generally applicable law. The minimum amount of fuel that the Contractor will provide to the Ordering Party is 100,000 liters. 3.Car Contractor.... Published Date: 2025-12-18. Closing Date: 2026-01-16. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

In addition, the scope of the order includes the construction of an information board with dimensions of 240 cm x 120 cm in accordance with the guidelines of the European Funds for Silesia Program 2021-2027. Guidelines available at https://funduszeue.slaskie.pl/Wiedz/zasady_promocji_oznaowania#tablice Attention! the boards should be placed immediately after starting work at the investment site, the board must be placed in a publicly accessible and clearly visible place. Detailed description of the scope orders are specified in the Utility Functional Program, which constitutes Annex No. 7 to the SWZ.

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: PROVINCIAL HEADQUARTERS OF THE STATE FIRE SERVICE IN RZESZÓW. Summary: Cashless Purchase of Fuel for Means of Transport for the Needs of the Provincial Headquarters of the State Fire Service in Rzeszów Throughout the Country. Description: The subject of the order is the delivery of the above-mentioned quantities and types of liquid fuels through gas stations accepting cashless fuel cards for vehicles and motor equipment owned by the Provincial Headquarters of the State Fire Service in Rzeszów in estimated quantity: a) Approximately 10,000 liters of unleaded gasoline (Pb-95) per year, b) Approximately 27,000 liters of diesel oil (ON) per year. When entering the tender, the contractor should have fuel stations throughout the country. Delivery of the order item will be carried out on the basis of ad hoc, cashless refueling of vehicles to their tanks at the selected station of the supplier who submitted the most advantageous offer. The subject of the order will be collected on the basis of issued fuel cards with the possibility of blocking the card in in the event of reporting loss or theft. The Supplier will provide fuel cards issued to the Ordering Party, authorizing them to make cashless transactions with operators running fuel stations. A detailed description of the subject of the order is included in a. No. 2 to SWZ - Description the subject of the order, and the detailed terms of implementation. No. 4 to SWZ - Draft contract. Published Date: 2025-12-16. Closing Date: 2025-12-23. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: Part 1 Purchase of fuel for the needs of the Road and Bridge District No. 1 in Skrki: unleaded 95 gasoline in an estimated amount of 4,500 l; diesel oil in an estimated amount of 14,500 liters. The order will be processed successively in a non-cash form in quantities depending on depending on the actual needs of the Ordering Party from the date of signing the contract until December 31, 2026. The place of purchase of unleaded gasoline Pb 95 and diesel oil will be the Contractor's gas station located no more than 12 km from the headquarters of the Road and Bridge Districts, i.e. Skrki. The Contractor will ensure the sale of liquid fuels that meet all standards in accordance with applicable regulations. Settlements between the Contractor and the Ordering Party will be made on the basis of actually purchased fuels. The price shall be paid by the Ordering Party each time it is collected the fuel will result from the actual quantity collected and the price applicable on the date of collection reduced by the offered discount. If the estimated amount of purchased fuel is reduced in accordance with the actual needs of the Ordering Party, the Contractor will not be entitled to any No claims against the Ordering Party.. Published Date: 2025-12-13. Closing Date: 2025-12-22. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: KINDERGARTEN NO. 72 IN KATOWICE. Summary: Katowice - Clean Air. Thermal Modernization of the Building of Municipal Kindergarten No. 72 in Katowice. Description: The subject of the order is the thermal modernization of the building of Kindergarten No. 72 as part of the task: WPF (UE) Katowice Clean Air. Thermal modernization of the building of the Municipal Kindergarten No. 72 in Katowice. The subject of the order includes the performance of construction works in scope of insulation of foundation and basement walls below ground level to a depth of approx. 2.30 m, insulation of the ceiling above the top floor, partial replacement of internal door joinery and partial replacement of external door joinery (door main and side entrances). The sanitary installation works will include replacing the heating system with a biomass boiler, modernizing the central heating installation with radiators, thermostatic valves and division into heating circuits, replacement of hot water installations excluding the kitchen (connection to a biomass boiler room with central hot water preparation and circulation), replacement of heat exchangers, replacement of the internal central heating installation. The electrical installation is expected to include replacement of fixtures in some children's playrooms and toilets, installation of emergency lighting, replacement of lightning protection installations and switchboards, .... Published Date: 2025-12-13. Closing Date: 2026-01-09. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

(area of ​​the sewage treatment plant, Lubomyle 55). The given quantity of the subject of the order is an estimate based on fuel consumption in 2024 and 2025, therefore they may change. The scope of changes is expected to be +/- 10%. Regardless of the amount of fuel purchased in relation to the estimated quantity, the Contractor will not be entitled to any claim against the Ordering Party for failure to perform the contract. The subject of the order should meet the quality requirements specified in the provisions of generally applicable law, in in particular the Regulation of the Minister of Climate and Environment of June 26, 2024 on quality requirements for liquid fuels (Journal of Laws of 2024, item 1018) and the requirements specified in the PN-EN 590:2022-08 standard. (automation of installation operation and connection to the building energy management system); e) replacing all windows in the school and the sports hall facilities with energy-saving joinery with a coefficient of heat transfer 0.9 W/m2K; f) insulating the external above-ground walls in the school part and the sports hall facilities with polystyrene with a heat conduction coefficient of 0.036 W/mK - 10 cm; g) adding insulation to the existing one; h) equipping the lighting installation with an automatic regulation system and installing the installation photovoltaic with a capacity of 49.81 kWp. The scope regarding renewable energy sources includes the construction of 2 photovoltaic installations: * installation no. 1 with a capacity of 30.37 kWp. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: KRYNICA-ZDROJ COMMUNE. Summary: Comprehensive Sales of Liquid Fuels for Vehicles and Equipment in the Krynica-Zdroj Commune in 2026. Description: 1. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: THERMAL ENERGY COMPANY "EMPEC" SP. Z O. O. IN USTKA. Summary: "Modernization of the Municipal Thermal Energy Generation System in Ustka. Description: 1. PART I - GENERAL DESCRIPTION OF THE PROJECT<br> 1.1. The purpose of the Procedure is to select a Private Partner who will conclude a Partnership Agreement with the Public Entity for joint implementation of the Project.<br> 1.2. The subject of the Partnership includes the joint implementation of the Project, based on the Local Development Plan applicable to the Real Estate, Urban and architectural concept, SWZ, Offer and Partnership Agreement, the aim of which is to develop the investment area and create a generation source.<br> 1.3. The basis for the Project is the construction and operation of a source of heat energy to power the city system. district heating in Ustka.<br> 1.4. It is assumed that a heat energy source will be constructed in three technological variants:<br> Technological Variant No. 1: construction of new sources of heat energy generation in renewable energy technology with a total installed capacity of 4.5 MW, consisting of high-parameter air heat pump (suggested power 3.1 MW) and optionally biomass boiler (suggested power 1.4 MW). The source will work at the base of the system, covering the heat demand for heating purposes and domestic hot water. The estimated amount of energy will be 114,422.68 GJ/year, which will be 57.60% of the annual demand for heat energy for the heating system.<br> Technological Variant No. 2: construction of new sources of heat energy generation in mixed technology, which will consist of a high-efficiency cogeneration system powered by natural gas and renewable energy sources with wow.... Published Date: 2025-12-03. Closing Date: 2026-01-09. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: MUNICIPAL UTILITY PLANT IN SZERZYNY. Summary: Delivery of Liquid Fuels for the Needs of the Municipal Utilities Plant in Szerzyny in 2026.. Description: The subject of the order is the successive delivery of fuels for service vehicles and machines used by the Communes Zakład Gospodarki Komunlnej in Szerzyny in the period from January 2025 to December 31, 2026. The Ordering Party expects the following amount of fuel: 1) Diesel oil: 30,000 liters (thirty thousand liters) 2) Unleaded petrol Pb 95: 4,000 liters (four thousand liters)3) LPG gas: 1,000 liters (one thousand liters) The indicated quantity of individual fuels is indicative and may change depending on needs, therefore the Ordering Party reserves the right to purchase fuel in the range: - not less than 70% of the order, - not more than 10% of the order. Fuels should meet the standards specified in the Regulation of the Minister of Climate and Environment of December 23, 2022 on quality requirements for solid fuels (Journal of Laws of 2022, item 2856) and relevant quality standards. The customer will collect all types of fuel at the gas station Supplier, which should be located no more than 7 km from the Ordering Party's headquarters.. Published Date: 2025-11-26. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: ZABRZE RECREATION COMPLEX. Summary: Delivery and Assembly of a Photovoltaic Installation for the Zabrze Aquarius Recreation Complex at Aleja Wojciecha Korfantego 18 in Zabrze, Carried out as Part of the Project: "Clean Zabrze - Transformation.... Description: Delivery and assembly of a photovoltaic installation for the Zabrze AQUARIUS Recreation Complex at Aleja Wojciecha Korfantego 18 in Zabrze, carried out as part of the project: "Clean Zabrze - transformation...<br> I. The subject of the order is the delivery and installation of a photovoltaic installation for the needs of Zabrzański AQUARIUS Recreation Complex at Aleja Wojciecha Korfantego 18 in Zabrze, implemented as part of the project: "Clean Zabrze - energy transformation of the city. Public utility - stage I" under the European Funds for Silesia Program 2021-2027. Project co-financed by the Fund Just Transition under the European Funds for Silesia Program 2021-2027, Priority FESL.10 "European Funds for Transformation", Measure FESL.10.06 "Development of distributed energy based on renewable energy sources". The order involves the implementation of a photovoltaic installation mounted on a carport type structure. The scope of the order includes: a) construction of carports with a photovoltaic installation, b) construction of an energy storage facility, c) land development. The photovoltaic installation will consist of: a) glass-glass photovoltaic modules mounted on the roof structure parking lots, b) photovoltaic inverters cooperating with photovoltaic modules, c) power optimizers on photovoltaic modules, d) direct current photovoltaic switchboards (RDC), e) alternating current photovoltaic switchgear (RPV), f) equipment of LV and MV switchgears of the facility for the installation photovoltaic and energy storage, g) direct current (DC) and alternating current (AC) cabling, h) integrated Energy Management System, i) energy storage, j) telemechanics system, k) energy measurement systems .... Published Date: 2025-11-26. Closing Date: 2025-12-11. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: ZBOJNA COMMUNE. Summary: Delivery of 40 M3 of Diesel Oil To the Reservoir at the Zbojna Commune Office in 2026.. Description: The subject of the order is the following task: Delivery of 40 m3 of diesel oil to the tank at the Zbjna Commune Office in 2026. The Ordering Party has a diesel oil tank with a capacity of 2,500 liters. The indicated amounts of oil are estimates and may vary. If the demand for oil decreases, there will be no contractors gave rise to no claims. The minimum guaranteed order quantity will be not less than 30%. Oil quality characteristics: Diesel oil must meet the quality requirements for liquid fuels contained in the Regulation of the Minister of Climate and Environment of June 26, 2024 on quality requirements for liquid fuels (Journal of Laws of 2024, item 1018, as amended). Diesel oil will be delivered by the Contractor's tank trucks and at his expense. The transport price must be included in the price of diesel fuel. The Contractor is obliged to deliver the ordered fuel to the Ordering Party within 72 hours from the moment (date and time) of submitting the order. order. The Ordering Party requires that in the winter the diesel fuel is adapted to winter conditions and, at the Ordering Party's request, delivered on the terms and conditions set out in contract.. Published Date: 2025-11-26. Closing Date: 2025-12-04. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: The subject of the order is the supply of fuel oil for the Social Welfare Home in Wieleń for 2026. The type of light fuel oil supplied should meet the requirements of the currently applicable Polish standard PN-C-96024: 2020-12 and the Regulation of the Minister of Energy of December 1, 2016 on the requirements quality standards regarding the sulfur content of oils and the types of installations and conditions in which heavy fuel oils will be used. The ordering party allows solutions equivalent to the above standards. The device must have CE Conformit European declaration or equivalent, accompanied by the necessary instructions and materials for use.
